entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening. A few rain showers beginning late this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries changing to a few flurries in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
